content.body:
### Shop 255/50R19 Tire Size The 255/50R19 tire size is an interesting one; it’s one you’ll find on vehicles as varied and diverse as the Hyundai Santa Fe, Dodge Challenger, Kia Sorento, Porsche Cayenne, Honda CR-V and even the Rolls-Royce Wraith. For most drivers, all-season tires are a great choice thanks to their balance of ride comfort, low noise, predictable handling and year-round traction, even in light snow. If you’re looking for premium all-season tires in 255/50R19, some of our picks would include the Michelin Latitude Tour HP, Nitto Motivo, [Yokohama Geolandar X-CV](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-x-cv), and the Falken Ziex CT60 A/S. Popular vehicles: 2015-2021 Hyundai Santa Fe
2020-2021 Dodge Challenger
2011-2020 Kia Sorento
2002-2010 Porsche Cayenne
2007-2016 Honda CR-V
2013-2020 Rolls-Royce Wraith A sporty vehicle like the Dodge Challenger, Porsche Cayenne, or Roll-Royce Wraith might be at its best with a pair of performance or ultra-high-performance tires such as the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Pirelli Scorpion Zero Asimmetrico, Hankook Ventus S1 evo2 SUV (K117A), or Nexen N’Fera RU1. All of these tires bring out the sporty traction and handling of a performance vehicle, and can only be used in warmer weather conditions. The ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS does feature an all-season rubber compound if you want sporty handling year-round, though. Maybe you live in a part of the country that has rough winters with lots of snow that lingers for weeks. You’ve probably already found out that in deeper snow, all-season tires just can’t usually get the job done. If you’re in need of serious winter traction, dedicated winter tires are the way to go, thanks to their softer, more pliable rubber compound and aggressive winter tread pattern. Check out tires like the Bridgestone Blizzak DM-V2, Nokian Hakkapeliitta 9 SUV, [Toyo Observe GSI-5](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/observe-gsi-5), or Kumho WinterCraft WS71. If you opt for winter tires, don’t forget to change them out when temperatures are above about 40 degrees Fahrenheit; their softer tread formulation wears quickly in warmer weather. Whether you drive a Dodge Challenger, Hyundai Santa Fe, Rolls-Royce Wraith, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 255/50R19 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
